abort.no_vehicles: No vehicles on account or all are configured already

error.invalid_vin: Vin not found for given account
error.invalid_mobile: Mobile number as username must be specified if using South African Region
error.invalid_token: Token is invalid, please check you copied the correct token from the Header Location, it should start with fordapp://

token.title: Setup Token
token.description: Please enter the full token from the Location: header once logging in using the URL below

data_description.username: If using a mobile instead of email please enter your number (minus initial 0) also include + and the country code (e.g. +99123456789)

vehicle.title: Select vehicle to add
vehicle.description: Only vehicles not currently added will be shown

vin.title: Manual Vin Entry
vin.description: Please enter your VIN number manually as no vehicles could be found automatticaly.

refresh_status.name: Refresh Vehicle Status
refresh_status.description: Poll car for latest status (Takes up to 5mins to update once this function has been run!)

vin.name: VIN
vin.description: Enter a vin number to only refresh the specified vehicle (Default refreshes all added vehicles)

poll_api.name: Poll API
poll_api.description: Manually poll API for data update (Warning: doing this too often could result in a ban)
